name: Theria Williams
text: Its inside the Gas Station...The Store was nice had lots of snacks to choose from fresh vegetables and the food looked really good they were cooking the place was clean but it maybe beat to order your ticket online ahead of time because there was a itty bitty Bus van showed up to take us to Birmingham and I had to pay a little extra because it was only 2 seats left..The lady was nice tho and helped with me with a discount...That was the nicest station from there to Cincinnati Ohio...

name: Beloved
text: The Customer Service was good and helpful the way they tried to assist because of late arrival due to a Bus maintenance delay.  Also, the Soul food restaurant inside is great!

name: BIANCA DENISE TOLBERT
text: Vey friendly, clean tickets are very affordable

name: Madame Angel
text: Cheap gas. Didn't go inside

name: Yfrufe Yfryd
text: Finding the office was confusing as it is located inside the gas station store (a desk on the left) without any signs on the outside. The bus can be up to 20 minutes late and sometimes no one would call if the bus arrived or not so you’ve to be on the look for it so keep that in mind (especially if you’re going to the airport). The bus and trip overall wasn’t that great. It’s good for desperate times when you don’t have any other means for transportation other than that wouldn’t recommend.

name: blnt
text: there was a homeless dude who smelled like overcooked shaving cream. He asked me if i had the morphie pallet from the james charles set. I politely said no and he proceeded to jump out of the bus. Rich people nowadays.

Nobody announced the bus was boarding and they all began to board early. Had I not been waiting outside I would have missed my bus and not gotten my 242 dollar round trip refunded.

Greyhound never fails to disappoint.

However it is cheap and convenient so if you do get a ticket just make sure you watch the buses because these drivers do not care and won't announce boarding .

name: Even Steven
text: This bus station is a newly opened location conveniently placed in a popular area that is easily noticable to the local residents. The southern cooked food sold inside this place is unmatched by other Gas Stations & Typical Greyhound Food Courts, but Beware! Please do be prepared to pay for the difference in quality. Their Food Is Expensive

name: Pinky Van Sciver
text: It was one of the most awesome experiences for me anyway,Ilike to travel.. Alabama's Greyhound Depot was very professional and curious. Thanks again..Pinky.

name: David Petrovich
text: After a 60hr cross country bus trip I can safely and confidently say....  My time riding the dirty dog is over. None of it was fun. I would not recommend to anyone unless you can  really endure it. Good luck to you, if you decide to do it. The busses are WAAAAAAYYY too crowded, and it's impossible to sleep unless you have a seat to yourself - spoiler alert - you won't.

name: asia thames
text: The driver was really rude and nasty very smart mouth the driving was horrible she was all over the road

name: Rex Lightning
text: Actually a BP gas station with a Greyhound kiosk inside. Not bad, closes early though.

name: Christopher Ollar
text: Prices were great and service was quick...

name: 都玲グッチ
text: I think I came here to drop a friend off once. Oh wait. No, I've never been here though I did drive through the city.

name: Authentic Replica
text: Horrible. Can't get refunded. Buses are NEVER on time. Don't do it people.

name: Melissa Powell
text: Horrible service!!! The bus was 2hrs late then arrives and I was told there are no seats on the bus. Wth! The attendant woman was unapologetic and nonchalant about it too.

name: Todd Ward
text: Its a gass station in the middle of nowhere. Not even close to downtown transit. Literally the only thing around is a trailer home with a barking dog tied up in the yard. But there is a (nasty)bathroom and drinks and snacks.

name: Dr. Eric Murphy
text: Need better service

name: Marlon Manson
text: Very crowded.

name: Kevin Wall
text: Bad 👎 no way

name: David Yaroshevsky
text: It's literally a gas station (the Greyhound window closes really early)

name: Colm Boyer
text: Safe

name: alicia deonna
text: Ok place.

name: Entrepreneurs Achieving Greatness Elevation Success
text: Home time with da fam

name: Juan Rangel
text:
(Translated by Google) First time

(Original)
Primer ves
